item.title: Ether notches first new record since 2021 after Powell speech teasing rate cuts
item.description: The price of ether smashed through its 2021 record on Friday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell hinted at upcoming rate cuts.

item.title: Fed is 'dovish' again and that's a 'green light' for small caps, Fundstrat's Tom Lee says
item.description: The Russell 2000 rallied in Friday's session after Fed Chair Jerome Powell hinted at possible rate cuts.

item.title: Where this BlackRock fund manager is finding pockets of opportunity in high-yield bonds
item.description: BlackRock's Mitchell Garfin is focusing on specific sectors and credit ratings in the high-yield market right now.

item.title: Lyft is in a major bottoming-out formation, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down a bullish chart formation in the ride-hailing company.

item.title: Citi maintains its bullishness on cloud stock Snowflake ahead of second-quarter earnings
item.description: Citi sees another upside of 28% ahead for shares of Snowflake.
